data.title: Coding projects
data.desc: As part of my growth as a programmer, I also have a Github account where I upload programming projects that I've done on my own and with friends. I maintain important projects like Completed-Games Registers (Java) and Bumper KartZ VS (C++ OpenGL).

image.title: Screenshot of my Github account
image.alt: An Screenshot of my Github account

data.title: Gaming content
data.desc: I have a YouTube channel called MrAlexbross where I upload videos about videogames, especially gameplays. Also, I have a Twitch channel where I sometimes do streams. I publish updates about new videos on my Facebook and Twitter pages. Besides, I've done videogame content like Minecraft maps and Geometry Dash, 64.0, and Super Mario Maker 2 levels.

image.title: MrAlexbross small banner
image.alt: A cover image with a logo from my YouTube channel 'MrAlexbross'

data.title: Off topic
data.desc: I usually share on Twitter other types of information that are not necessarily related to my YouTube channel, such as my thoughts on technology, videogames or something about me. I also have a Bandcamp account where I show off the music I'm listening to, and I also have a Steam account where you can see the latest stuff I've been playing.

image.title: Just a random drawing of Ralex
image.alt: A drawing of a stickman of my character called 'Ralex', painting a big text that reads 'Off Topic'
